ygData.subject: Dark Reunions and Evil Lights
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: As I am responding, please keep in mind that Tuson, at the beginning of this post, was several hundred meters away, and in a different thread from Leo

OOC: As I am responding, please keep in mind that Tuson, at the
beginning of this post, was several hundred meters away, and in a
different thread from Leo Prime and the rest of the Maximals and the
door is BEHIND the Maximals and Predacons, so he would most likely not
even be aware of its existence never mind its closing.

However I am merging the two threads now. GAME ON!

> <OLD>
>
> Tucson kicks up the blue light of his optics to give everyone a bit more
> light.  He was determined to reach the outside and meet up with Leo Prime to
> get to the bottom of the stasis pod trade off which he had NEVER been told
> or agreed to.   He was overstepped by Leo and was not happy.  In all his
> life he never thought he could feel distrust for a fellow Prime but, now he
> felt it.  He felt betrayed by the very being he thought was honest with him.
>  And now he felt that the one who truly earned that right was Big Convoy.
> But now things had to change.  He had to gain full command of his division
> and it meant having to tell Leo in a civil manner that it was best for him
> to stand down and return full leadership to Tucson Prime, who would never in
> his life, submit to such an unspeakable demand of trading a life in exchange
> for cooperation.
>
> So he sends a message to Leo hoping it would reach him.
>
> Leo, it has come to my attention that you have made an unspeakable demand
> with the Predicons in order to establish their cooperation.  By doing so you
> overstepped my command and agreed to something I would never agree to.
> Needless to say when all is said and done, I expect you to answer for your
> actions and I demand that your unspeakable bargain be renounced immediately,
> as well as your chain of command.  I will allow you to remain among us but
> keep in mind you will be under my command.  The same will hold true for
> Rodimus upon his return.  And now, to take your place, I hereby request that
> Big Convoy assists me in leadership of our troop."
>
> He turns to Big Convoy.
>
> " I would be honored if you would take your place beside me as leader of my
> Maximal clan.  My command is your command and you have proven to be more
> than trustworthy.  Everyone, you are all welcome among my clan.  Our home is
> your home now."

<NEW>

TUSCON's attempt to send a radio wave signal is met with static as the
transmission was completely lost.

However TUSCON's hearing is able to pick up the sound of many
individuals approaching from one of the paths leading away from where
he was standing. In fact there were three. One led back in the
direction he came, another led further down into darkness and the
third led upwards, and that was the direction he thought he heard LEO
PRIME's voice, along with several other voices.

BIG CONVOY glanced at TUSCON at his offer, "You mean you believe this
Predacon about Leo Prime?" CONVOY had a surprised look on his face.

> <OLD>
>
> There was an amused glance over at the roaring TUSCON, and DRILL BIt
> murmured, "Really, Maximal, you should have been a Predacon. You acn't go
> half a breem without screaming at someone.." Audible only to those paying
> -close- attention given all of the yelling going around at hte moment.
>
> Listening as the MAXIMALS came down the hole, DRILL BIT, not yet aware of
> the slamming trap up top, whispered, "Right ons chedule."
>
> Then as the MAXIMALS and possibly teh PREDACONS were coming on down,
> went to transform and then dig away underground to lie in wait anew.

> <OLD>
>
> Tucson growls back at Drill Bit with a snarl.
>
> " Just focus on what you're doing and mind your own business. "
>
> He tries very hard to keep his composure but it was difficult to resist the
> temptation of snapping Drill bit to smitherines.

As this was going on BIG CONVOY was looking at the upward path as he
could see others approaching.

It was LEO PRIME followed closely by a mech that TUSCON probrably only
knew by reputation . . .

CRYOTEK.

He was rumored to have been amongst the PREDACON faction although it
could never quite be proven. There were some who even speculated he
ran it until MEGATRON took over, but it could never be proven. Even
with the theft of the golden disk, which cast many allegations his way
nothing ever stuck to him. However he disappeared soon after.

Behind CRYOTEK was other MAXIMALS, TORCA plus his FUZORS, minus
SILVBERBOLT who was still at the Ark. WINGCALBER and SANTON were also
in accompanyment, as well as RAT TRAP and QUICKSTRIDE.

Behind the MAXIMALS curiously bringing up the rear was SKYSHADOW and
his FUZOR team along with DINOBOT and WASPINATOR.

SKYSHADOW seemed to be wearing a pointedly irritated look on his face
as he walked. Occasionally he looked behind him at the locked door
that TUSCON could not see.

LEO came up to BIG CONVOY and shook hands. "Welcome." LEO said. "It
has been some time."

BIG CONVOY nodded, "It has indeed." He said. He jerked his head in
TUSCON's direction and the pile of dirt that used to be DRILLBIT,
"Tuscon want's to talk to you."

LEO PRIME glanced at his soldiers behind him for a moment ands then
turned to TUSCON a curious look on his face, "So what's the situation
down here?"


(TAG)

- Preston
